description: The Kiyalunga, named for and piloted by Kittan`s sister Kiyal, has the ability to transform into a lance and shield for use by the King Kittan, with Kittan referring to the formation as the King Kittan Deluxe. A homage to this Gunman is seen when Kittan piloted the Space King Kittan, where wielded weapons that resembles the Kiyalunga`s lance and shield transformation.
name: Kiyalunga
